name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ MUSIC
description: 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ MUSIC' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪MUSIC) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Portable on November 24th, 2011. It is the sixth entry to be made for the main series, and the first installment of the 'MUSIC' spin-off series: focusing more on rhythm-based gameplay, than a visual novel experience. There are, however, segments that feature mini scenarios in-between sessions.
